name: Heroes of Pixels
description:
Clean the dust of yours gamepads and  CALL YOURS FRIENDS to play this amazing local arena PvP multiplayer game!!!

Playable in 1v1, 1v1v1, 1v1v1v1, 1v2, 2v2, or even 1v3. Kill each other in any team amount you want!

This game is way more smooth when played with gamepads/joysticks!

FEATURES:

- Up to 4 teams and 4 players in whatever team each player wants;

- 1 Arena;

- 1 Mode SURVIVAL: the last team alive wins;

- 4 Playable heroes, each hero with  4 unique skills;

- Each hero has 1 basic skill (more spammable), 1 control skill, 1 movement skill and 1 ultimate skill, the two firsts generates energy, and the ultimate consumes energy as a cost, how much energy you have more powerful or durable is your ultimate.

Take in mind this is a pre-Beta build and should be considered a demo of the final game, everything can be changed!
